Regression

Import Statement:

from regressor import *
Linear_Regression(Iteration, Learning_Rate)
Parameters:

  • Iteration (int) – No. of iterations

  • Learning_Rate (float) – The rate at which the model should learn

fit(X, Y)
Parameters:

  • X (output from sklearn train_test_split()) – the x_train

  • Y (output from sklearn train_test_split()) – the y_train
